wikipedia_page.main: Stella Sutherland (7 October 1924 – 15 October 2015) was one of the Shetland writers of the later 20th and early 21st century. Best known for poetry in both English and Shetland dialect, she also contributed articles and short stories to local magazines, especially  The New Shetlander.

response: Vagaland, who grew up in Walls, was arguably Shetland's finest poet of the 20th century."Vagaland" , shetlopedia.com, Retrieved 8 March 2011 Haldane Burgess was a Shetland historian, poet, novelist, violinist, linguist and socialist, and Rhoda Bulter (1929–1994) is one of the best-known Shetland poets of recent times.
